translations: n.（Highness）（对王室成员的尊称）殿下，阁下

sentences.sentence: Twas she that hath disturbed your Highness.
sentences.translation: 就是她扰乱了殿下的心情。

sentences.sentence: Lord Hertford said, "So please your highness, it is for you to command, it is for us to obey."
sentences.translation: 赫德福勋爵说：“殿下，这是您的命令，我们得执行。”

sentences.sentence: The soldier brought his halberd to a present-arms and said mockingly, "I salute your gracious Highness."
sentences.translation: 那个卫兵举起他的戟致敬，并嘲弄地说：“我给尊敬的殿下敬礼。”
